messages.content: Hi Sarah! Thanks for connecting. I loved your recent post about the Q4 roadmap.
Thanks Marcus! I saw your React component library announcement - that's incredible work. Are you planning to add any specific accessibility features?
Absolutely! Accessibility is a top priority. I'm working on ARIA support and keyboard navigation for all components. Would love your feedback when it's ready.
Sarah, your insights on progressive disclosure align perfectly with our recent research findings. Would you be interested in collaborating on a case study?
That sounds fascinating! I'd love to learn more about your research methodology. When would be a good time to chat?
Hey Marcus, saw your component library! The TypeScript definitions look solid. Have you considered adding Docker support for development?
Great suggestion! I was actually thinking about that. A Docker setup would make it much easier for contributors to get started.
